synopsis.text: Himeno's life takes an unexpected turn when the third-grader moves to a grand countryside mansion, only to discover it's inhabited by colorful ninjas! Akamaki, the fire-tender, Aomaki, the water-keeper, and Kiiromaki, the carpenter, mistake her for royalty and use their unique abilities to solve her problems. But these ninjas have more up their sleeves! When they combine, they transform into powerful entities: Midorimaki, Murasakimaki, and T≈çmaki. As Himeno adapts to her vibrant new life, a massive tornado threatens the mansion. Will the colorful ninjas be able to protect her and her family? Join Himeno and her extraordinary friends in this whimsical adventure!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
